data.sectionDescription: Everything you love wrapped in a flour tortilla

item.title: Burrito
item.description: Chorizo's handcrafted burritos are rolled in a fresh flour with cilantro-lime rice, your choice of slowed cooked black or punto beans.

item.title: Fajita
item.description: A fresh flour tortilla, cilantro-lime rice, sautéed peppers and onions, cheese, lettuce, sour cream, your choice of two salsas, and more.

item.title: FajRito
item.description: A combination of Chorizo's two classics, the Fajita and Burrito. A fresh flour tortilla, cilantro-lime rice, sautéed peppers and onions, cheese.

item.title: Vegetarian Burrito
item.description: Chorizo's handcrafted burritos are rolled in a fresh flour tortilla with cilantro-lime rice, your choice of slowed cooked black or pinto beans.

item.title: The el Grande
item.description: A FajRito with double meat! A fresh flour tortilla, cilantro-lime rice, sautéed peppers and onios, your choice of beans, cheese, lettuce.

data.sectionDescription: Tasty favourites ready for you to customize and enjoy!

item.title: Dos Tacos
item.description: Two flour tortilla filled with cheese, lettuce, your choice of salsas, choice of meat, and more.

item.title: Two Soft Vegetarian Tacos
item.description: Two flour tortillas filled with cheese, lettuce, and your choice of salsas.

item.title: Fiesta Saldad
item.description: Romaine lettuce, beans, cheesem your choice of two salsas, choice of dressing, choice of meet, and more.

item.title: Quesadilla
item.description: Tasty quesadilla stuffed with cheese, your choice of two salsas, choice of beans, choice of meat, and more. Toasted to perfection.

item.title: Nachos
item.description: Freshly made in-house tortilla chips topped with aged cheddar sauce, your choice of beans, choice of two salsas, choice of meat, and more.

data.sectionDescription: Tasty favourites ready for you to customize and enjoy! Served with chips, salsas, and your choice of beverage

item.title: Dos Tacos Combo
item.description: Two flour tortillas filled with cheese, lettuce your chice of salsas, choice of meat and more. Served with tortilla chips, your choice of salsa.

item.title: Two Soft Vegetarian Tacos Combo
item.description: Two flour tortillas filled with cheese, lettuce, and your choice of salsas. Comes with tortilla chips, your choice of salsa, and a drink of choice.

item.title: Fiesta Salad Combo
item.description: Romaine lettuce, beans, cheese, your choice of two salsas, choice of dressing, choice of meat, and more. Served with tortilla chips.

item.title: Quesadilla Combo
item.description: Tasty quesadilla stuffed with cheese, your choice of two salsas, choice of beans, choice of meat, and more. Toasted to perfection.

item.title: Nachos Combo
item.description: Freshly made in-house tortilla chips topped with aged cheddar sauce, your choice of beans, choice of two salsas, choice of meat, and more.

data.sectionDescription: Can't get enough of that mango pineapple salsa? Get 12 ounces of it to keep in the fridge!

item.title: Tortilla Chips
item.description: Freshly made corn tortilla chips. (60 Cals)

item.title: Cheesecake! Dulce de Leche
item.description: Creamy caramel cheesecake baked on a vanilla crumb and topped with caramel swirled mousse and whipped cream rosettes.

item.title: Cheesecake! Wild Strawberries and Cream
item.description: Wild strawberry cheesecake and classic cheesecake marbled together on a vanilla crumb, topped with a layer of strawberry cream.

item.title: Cheesecake! Vanilla Bean
item.description: Layers of creamy Tahitian vanilla bean cheesecake, white chocolate vanilla mousse, finished with whipped cream, on a vanilla cookie crumb.

item.title: Cheesecake! Triple Ghirardelli® Chocolate
item.description: Creamy chocolate cheesecake filled with milk and dark chocolate chips, baked on a moist chocolate brownie.

item.title: Dos Churros (2pcs)
item.description: End your meal with a sweet note! Warm cinnamon churros cooked to order, with a dulce de leche dipping sauce.

data.sectionDescription: Don't forget a beverage to quench your thirst!

item.title: Bottled Drinks (473 mL)
item.description: A cold, bottled drink of your choice!

item.title: Bottled Water (591 mL)
item.description: A cold bottle of Dasani water.

item.title: Bottled Juice (450 mL)
item.description: Bottles of Minute Maid juice in the flavour of your choice!.

item.title: Mexican Soda (Jarrito's) (370 mL)
item.description: Delicious Mexican soda, four flavours to choose from!.
